name: MovieRoulette
0:
”Alexa, ask Movie Roulette to pick a comedy”
”to pick any movie”
”for a Horror movie”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie roulette
des: Give Movie Roulette a genre and get a movie and summary back. Or leave it up to the luck of the draw and ask for any type of movie. Movies are commonly found on popular streaming services.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
